title: Hot Shot of the Month: Vote for January's winner
description: The 2025 ATP Tour season opened with a bang in January, with the game's biggest stars producing some strong early-year form and, of course, spectacular hot shots. We've done the hard yards to whittle down the month's most jaw-dropping heroics to four efforts contending to be crowned January's Hot Shot of the Month. And here's your chance to determine the winner. Watch the hots shots from Hubert Hurkacz, Sebastian Korda, Gael Monfils and Kei Nishikori below and then visit the voting page to cast your vote for your favourite before 12pm ET on Monday, February 10.     [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Voet for your favourite hot shot from Hubert Hurkacz, Sebastian Korda, Gael Monfils and Kei Nishikori from January's ATP Tour tennis action.
text: Hot Shot of Month Voting open through February 10 February 06, 2025 The 2025 ATP Tour season opened with a bang in January, with the game's biggest stars producing some strong early-year form and, of course, spectacular hot shots. We've done the hard yards to whittle down the month's most jaw-dropping heroics to four efforts contending to be crowned January's Hot Shot of the Month. And here's your chance to determine the winner. Watch the hots shots from Hubert Hurkacz, Sebastian Korda, Gael Monfils and Kei Nishikori below and then visit the voting page to cast your vote for your favourite before 12pm ET on Monday, February 10.
html:
Hot Shot of Month

Voting open through February 10

February 06, 2025

The 2025 ATP Tour season opened with a bang in January, with the game's biggest stars producing some strong early-year form and, of course, spectacular hot shots.

We've done the hard yards to whittle down the month's most jaw-dropping heroics to four efforts contending to be crowned January's Hot Shot of the Month. And here's your chance to determine the winner.

Watch the hots shots from Hubert Hurkacz, Sebastian Korda, Gael Monfils and Kei Nishikori below and then visit the voting page to cast your vote for your favourite before 12pm ET on Monday, February 10.
